---
title: "Ice Cover"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(beeswarm)
```

```{r}
meteorlogical <- read_csv(here("data", "ntl20_v6.csv"))

ice_cover <- read_csv(here("data", "ntl33_v7.csv"), na ="-999")
```

```{r}
ice_cover |> ggplot(aes(y = ice_duration, x = lakeid)) + geom_jitter() + geom_boxplot(outlier.color = NA)

```

```{r}
summary <- ice_cover |> group_by(year4) |> summarize(mean = mean(ice_duration, na.rm = TRUE))

```
